name: speed typing
description: Improve your typing speed and accuracy while racing in immersive 3D environments!
moveTheCar: Move the car by dragging it!
playDescription: Start the game and improve your typing skills.
homeDescription: Home page of the speed typing game.
searchDescription: Search for your favorite quotes, authors, or categories.
playResultsDescription: View your results from the last game you played.

Features.typingPracticeDescription: Practice your typing skills with our interactive typing game. Improve your typing speed and accuracy.
Features.customizationDescription: Customize the app's appearance with a variety of customization options. Choose and color your car, find the best track for you and more.
Features.leaderboardsDescription: Compete against other racers and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Can you beat the fastest typists in the world?

Auth.selectOne: Select one of the following options to sign in.
Auth.agreeToOur: By selecting a option, u are agreeing to our
